sql: SELECT MIN(t.title) AS american_vhs_movie FROM company_type AS ct, info_type AS it, movie_companies AS mc, movie_info AS mi, title AS t WHERE ct.kind  = 'production companies' AND mc.note  like '%(VHS)%' and mc.note like '%(USA)%' and mc.note like '%(1994)%' AND mi.info  IN ('USA', 'America') AND t.production_year > 2010 AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.id = mc.movie_id AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id AND it.id = mi.info_type_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(mc mi it t ct)
 HashJoin(mc mi it t)
 HashJoin(mc mi it)
 MergeJoin(mi it)
 BitmapScan(mc)
 TidScan(mi)
 BitmapScan(it)
 BitmapScan(t)
 BitmapScan(ct)
 Leading((((mc (mi it)) t) ct)) */
